T02D2923:320a-1: badzra bi d'a ra na karmma bi dhi s'a dha nam /
T02D2923:320a-3: rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i las sgrub pa'i thabs
T02D2923:320a-4: kyi cho ga / rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa
T02D2923:320a-6: rang lha'i dmigs pa gsal ba dang //
T02D2923:320a-7: sngags kyi bzlas pa mthar phyin pas //
T02D2923:320a-8: rig sngags thogs pa med pa dang //
T02D2923:320a-9: pha rol sde las rgyal ba dang //
T02D2923:320a-10: skrag dang mthu stobs gzhig pa dang //
T02D2923:320a-11: rig sngags gcad dang mnan pa dang //
T02D2923:320a-12: las gzhol pha rol las gzhig dang //
T02D2923:320a-13: gdon brlag gdon las grol ba dang //
T02D2923:320a-14: 'byung po dgug dang mnan pa dang //
T02D2923:320a-15: las rnams ma grub spogs pa dang //
T02D2923:320a-16: grub pa'i 'bras bu mthar dbyung dang //
T02D2923:320a-18: bsrung dang zhi dang rgyas pa dang //
T02D2923:320a-19: rengs dang rmugs par byed pa yi //
T02D2923:320a-20: thun mong khyad par bdag nyid kyi //
T02D2923:320a-21: cho ga nyi shu'i sbyor ba rnams //
T02D2923:320a-22: ji ltar bla ma'i man ngag las //
T02D2923:320a-23: rtogs pa'i rim pa gsal bar bya //
T02D2923:320a-24: de la las gang sgrub kyang thog ma nyid du
T02D2923:320a-25: rang gi rig sngags kyi mthu thogs pa med par
T02D2923:320a-26: bya ba las // de'i rim pa ni 'di yin te /
T02D2923:320a-27: dben zhing rab tu shis pa'i gnas su mandal gyi dbus su thab khung brus te //
T02D2923:320b-0: der dri bzang po dang ldan pa'i bud shing @320b brtsig la /
T02D2923:320b-1: sgrub pa po'i khyim nas me blangs te sbar ba'i
T02D2923:320b-2: dbus su sgrub thabs nas 'byung ba'i rim pas rang
T02D2923:320b-3: gi lha gsal bar dmigs la /
T02D2923:320b-4: de la mchod pa dang bstod pa sngon du song ba'i mar gyi sreg blugs phul te /
T02D2923:320b-5: de nas gzhan du longs ma spyad pa'i me tog
T02D2923:320b-6: sngon po dkar gsum dang mngar gsum gyis rnam par
T02D2923:320b-7: sbags la // gang la bsnyen pa byas pa'i sngags kyis thab tu dbul zhing bsreg par bya'o //
T02D2923:320b-8: ji srid mngon par 'dod pa'i sbyin sreg gi mthar
T02D2923:320b-9: rig sngags kyi mthu thogs pa med pa'i don gsol
T02D2923:320b-10: nas / yi ge brgya pa mu: 'i mtha' can gyis gshegs shing bsdu'o //
T02D2923:320b-11: rim pa 'dis bsnyen pa ji tsam du byas pa'i
T02D2923:320b-12: grangs kyi bcu'i cha'i sbyin sreg yongs su rdzogs par
T02D2923:320b-13: byas na rig sngags kyi las gang sgrub kyang mthu
T02D2923:320b-15: gzhan yang de'i sbyor ba la //
T02D2923:320b-16: me dbus bdag gi lha dmigs te //
T02D2923:320b-17: sngags bcas mar la bsnyugs pa yi //
T02D2923:320b-18: d'ur ba bsregs pa khri phrag gis //
T02D2923:320b-19: gang la bsnyen pa'i sngags kyi las //
T02D2923:320b-20: thogs pa med par byed pa'o //
T02D2923:320b-22: sngags bcas bgegs sgrib zhi ba yis //
T02D2923:320b-23: sgrub pos gang gi las sgrub pa'i //
T02D2923:320b-24: rig sngags thogs pa med par byed //
T02D2923:320b-25: pha rol gyi dmag dpung las rgyal bar 'dod na
T02D2923:320b-26: lha chen po la phul ba'i rgyal mtshan kyi ras
T02D2923:320b-27: sam / 'gegs nas shi ba'i ro las bshus pa'i
T02D2923:320b-28: ras la dug dang khrag dang dur khrod kyi sol
T02D2923:320b-29: bas re kh'a bcu yongs su bskor ba'i 'khor lo
T02D2923:320b-30: rtsibs brgyad pa phyi rol du padma 'dab ma brgyad
T02D2923:320b-32: de'i phyi rol du slar yang 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad
T02D2923:320b-33: pa kha drug pa rdo rje dang bcas pa la
T02D2923:320b-34: bla ma'i man ngag rnam par rig pas sngags kyi
T02D2923:320b-35: yi ge rnams yang dag par bkod pa'i lte bar
T02D2923:320b-36: che ge mo'i dmag dpung stambha ya nan /
T02D2923:320b-37: zhes pa'i bskul tshig dang bcas pa bris te /
T02D2923:320b-38: rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas pa'i mdun du lhag
T02D2923:320b-39: pa'i lha gsal bar dmigs nas de las rnam par
T02D2923:320b-40: spros pa'i sbrul ba'i pho nyas pha rol gyi dmag
T02D2923:320b-41: dpung stong grogs kyi lha dang bcas pa bkug cing
T02D2923:320b-43: dmigs pas sngags kyi bzlas pa rdzogs pa dang /
T02D2923:320b-44: 'khor lo thod pa kha sbyar du bcug ste /
T02D2923:321a-0: dbang chen dang ri bo la gnas pa'i sna tshogs rdo @321a * //
T02D2923:321a-1: rjes rgyas btab nas gang du g-yul 'gyed pa'i gnas
T02D2923:321a-2: der sbas pas thams cad du rang gi sde rnams
T02D2923:321a-3: pha rol las rgyal bar byed do //
T02D2923:321a-4: yang pha rol dang rtsod pa las rgyal bar 'dod
T02D2923:321a-5: pas sngar bstan pa'i 'khor lo'i lte bar che ge
T02D2923:321a-6: mo'i ngag stambha ya nan zhes pa dang bcas pa
T02D2923:321a-7: bris nas rang lha'i rnal 'byor dang mdun du lhag
T02D2923:321a-8: pa'i lha gsal bar dmigs te /
T02D2923:321a-9: de las sprul pa'i pho nya'i tshogs kyis pha rol
T02D2923:321a-10: gyi ngag gi stobs thams cad bkug cing 'khor lo'i
T02D2923:321a-12: grog mkhar gyi sa la gzugs brnyan byas pa'i snying
T02D2923:321a-13: gar bcug nas de la'ang bsgrub bya'i rnam par shes
T02D2923:321a-14: pa bcug ste / de nas sngags dang bcas pa'i
T02D2923:321a-15: seng ldeng gi tsher ma dug gi chu la sbags
T02D2923:321a-16: pa lce la bsnun pa dang /
T02D2923:321a-17: mthar thod pa kha sbyar du bcug nas rig sngags
T02D2923:321a-18: mnan pa'i sbyor ba byas na pha rol dang rtsod
T02D2923:321a-19: pa las rgyal bar byed do //
T02D2923:321a-20: 'byung po'i gdon skrag par bya bar 'dod pas sngar
T02D2923:321a-21: bstan pa'i 'khor lo'i lte bar skrag cing tshar gcod
T02D2923:321a-22: pa'i 'byung po'i ming bris nas grog mkhar gyi sa
T02D2923:321a-23: las byas pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi snying gar bcug ste
T02D2923:321a-24: rang lha'i rnal 'byor la gnas pa'i mdun du lhag
T02D2923:321a-25: pa'i lha gsal bar dmigs shing /
T02D2923:321a-26: de las rnam par spros pa'i pho nya'i tshogs kyis bkug cing bstim pa dang /
T02D2923:321a-27: de nas sngags brjod pa dang bcas pa'i yungs kar
T02D2923:321a-28: gyis brab pa'i mthar thug dang khrag dang gu gul
T02D2923:321a-29: dang byi la'i ril ma dang khyi'i rtug pa sbyar
T02D2923:321a-30: ba'i bdug pas bdugs na rnam par skrag cing tshar
T02D2923:321a-32: pha rol gyi mthu stobs gzhil bar 'dod na sngar
T02D2923:321a-33: bstan pa'i 'khor lo'i lte bar gang gi mthu stobs
T02D2923:321a-34: gzhil bar 'dod pa de'i ming bskul tshig dang bcas
T02D2923:321a-35: pa bris nas rang lha'i rnal 'byor la gnas pa'i
T02D2923:321a-36: mdun du lhag pa'i lhar dmigs pa de las spros
T02D2923:321a-37: pa'i pho nya rnams kyis pha rol gyi sbyor ba
T02D2923:321a-38: las byung ba'i mthu stobs bkug nas 'khor lo'i lte
T02D2923:321a-40: sngags kyi bzlas pa byas pa'i mthar thod pa kha sbyar du bcug nas /
T02D2923:321a-41: dbang chen ri rab la gnas pa'i sna tshogs rdo
T02D2923:321a-42: rjes rgyas btab pa sbyor ba po'i the ma 'og
T02D2923:321a-43: tu sbas na pha rol gyi sbyor ba las byung
T02D2923:321a-44: ba'i mthu stobs thams cad 'jil bar byed do //
T02D2923:321b-0: gzhan gyi rig sngags gcad @321b por 'dod pas sngar
T02D2923:321b-1: bstan pa'i 'khor lo'i lte bar che ge mo'i rig
T02D2923:321b-2: sngags tstshinda tstshinda zhes pa'i spel tshig dang bcas pa
T02D2923:321b-3: bris la rang lha'i rnal 'byor dang /
T02D2923:321b-4: mdun du lhag pa'i lha dmigs te /
T02D2923:321b-5: de las spros pa'i pho nya'i tshogs kyis pha rol
T02D2923:321b-6: gyi rig sngags kyi sbyor ba las byung ba'i mthu
T02D2923:321b-7: thams cad 'khor lo'i lte bar bsdus pa dang /
T02D2923:321b-8: rang gi rig pa'i mthu las byung ba'i mtshon cha
T02D2923:321b-9: dang me'i tshogs kyis dum bur byas shing bsreg pa
T02D2923:321b-10: la dmigs nas sngags bzlas so //
T02D2923:321b-11: de nas 'khor lo dum bur gtubs nas sbyin sreg
T02D2923:321b-12: byas pa'i thal ba rlung la bskur na gzhan gyi
T02D2923:321b-13: rig sngags kyi las thams cad gcod par byed do
T02D2923:321b-14: // pha rol gyi rig sngags mnan par 'dod na
T02D2923:321b-15: sngar bstan pa'i 'khor lo'i lte bar che ge mo'i
T02D2923:321b-16: rig sngags stambha ya nan zhes pa'i spel tshig bkod
T02D2923:321b-17: // pa bris la / rang lha'i rnal 'byor la
T02D2923:321b-18: gnas pa'i mdun du lhag pa'i lhar dmigs shing de
T02D2923:321b-19: las spros pa'i pho nya'i tshogs kyis pha rol gyi
T02D2923:321b-20: rig sngags kyi mthu thams cad 'khor lo'i lte bar
T02D2923:321b-21: // pa bris la / bsdus pa dang / rang
T02D2923:321b-22: gi sngags las byung ba'i dbang chen la gnas pa'i
T02D2923:321b-23: ri bo rdo rje dang bcas pas mnan par bsgom
T02D2923:321b-25: mthar thod pa kha sbyar du bcug ste dbang chen
T02D2923:321b-26: la sogs pa'i rgyas btab nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i
T02D2923:321b-27: ring bsrel gyi snying po can gyi mchod rten gyi
T02D2923:321b-28: 'og tu mnan na pha rol gyi rig sngags mnan
T02D2923:321b-29: par 'gyur ro // gal te rang gi mi dge
T02D2923:321b-30: ba'i las thams cad 'joms par 'dod na rin po
T02D2923:321b-31: che'i snod du tsandan gyi gsol ba la me bus
T02D2923:321b-32: par 'gyur ro // te / rang lha'i rnal 'byor
T02D2923:321b-33: la gnas pa'i mdun du til gyi snod gzhag la
T02D2923:321b-34: snying ga nas spros pa'i 'od kyis lhag pa'i lha
T02D2923:321b-36: de las spros pa'i 'od zer gyis bdag gi lus
T02D2923:321b-37: khyab par mi dge ba'i las kyi bsags pa'i dri
T02D2923:321b-38: ma rnams snying gar 'dus nas mi sdug pa'i gzugs
T02D2923:321b-39: can du gyur pa sna'i bu gnas 'thon te /
T02D2923:321b-40: til la thim par bsams la sngags brjod pa dang
T02D2923:321b-41: bcas pa bsregs pa'i mthar mdun gyi lha'i lus las
T02D2923:321b-42: ye shes kyi bdud rtsi babs pas bdag nyid kyi
T02D2923:321b-43: lus kun du gang bar bsgoms la /
T02D2923:321b-44: yi ge brgya pa ci nus brjod nas gshegs pa'o //
T02D2923:322a-0: 'dis ni mi dge ba'i las thams @322a * //
T02D2923:322a-1: cad bcom ste 'bras bu mi 'byin par byed do //
T02D2923:322a-2: yang gzhan gyi mi dge ba'i las 'jig par 'dod na de'i rim pa 'di yin te /
T02D2923:322a-3: dben zhing nyams dga' ba'i sa phyogs su zhi ba'i
T02D2923:322a-4: las dang mthun pa'i thab khung du bud shing brtsig
T02D2923:322a-5: ste / rang lha'i rnal 'byor la gnas pas der
T02D2923:322a-6: me sbar ba'i dbus su lhag pa'i lha la kun
T02D2923:322a-7: nas dkar ba'i kha dog can du dmigs la /
T02D2923:322a-8: de'i lus la dkar zhing bsil ba'i 'od zer byung
T02D2923:322a-9: bas pha rol po'i sdig pa thams cad 'jig par
T02D2923:322a-10: dmigs nas sngags dang bcas pa'i til gyi sbyin sreg
T02D2923:322a-11: byas pa'i mthar mchod bstod dang yi ge brgya pa
T02D2923:322a-12: brjod la gshegs su gsol de ltar pha rol po
T02D2923:322a-13: la dmigs nas yang dang yang du byas na de'i
T02D2923:322a-14: las thams cad nges par 'jig par byed do //
T02D2923:322a-15: yang lha la sogs pa'i gdon thams cad rlag par
T02D2923:322a-16: byed 'dod pas sngar bstan pa'i 'khor lo'i lte bar
T02D2923:322a-17: gang dag brlag par bya ba'i gdon gyi ming spel
T02D2923:322a-18: tshig dang bcas pa bris nas grog mkhar dang tshva
T02D2923:322a-19: sgo can dang 'jug ngogs dang shing rkang gcig gi
T02D2923:322a-20: sa dur khrod kyi thal ba dang lhan cig sprus
T02D2923:322a-21: pa las gzugs brnyan byas pa'i snying gar bcug ste
T02D2923:322a-22: / rang lha'i rnal 'byor dang mdun du lhag pa'i lha gsal bar dmigs nas /
T02D2923:322a-23: rnam par spros pa'i pho nya'i tshogs kyis bkug cing bcug ste /
T02D2923:322a-24: 'tshe zhing dum bur gtub ba dang bsreg cing thal
T02D2923:322a-25: bar byed pa la dmigs nas sngags brjod pa dang
T02D2923:322a-26: bcas pa'i yungs kar gyis brabs pa'i mthar sbyin sreg
T02D2923:322a-27: bya ste / thal ba rlung la phyar na gang
T02D2923:322a-28: la dmigs pa'i gdon de rlag par byed pa la
T02D2923:322a-30: gal te gza' la sogs pa'i gdon gyis bzung ba'i
T02D2923:322a-31: gnod pa thams cad las thar bar 'dod na gtsang
T02D2923:322a-32: zhing nyams dga' ba'i sa phyogs su mandal byas te
T02D2923:322a-33: / der bum pa gtsang ma'i dri'i chu la sogs
T02D2923:322a-34: pa nye bar mkho ba'i yo byad dang bcas pa
T02D2923:322a-35: / gzhag ste / rang lha'i rnal 'byor byas pas
T02D2923:322a-36: bum pa'i nang du'ang lhag pa'i lha gsal bar dmigs
T02D2923:322a-37: la gzungs kyi bzlas pa rdzogs pa'i mthar chu'i ngo
T02D2923:322a-38: bor bsams pas lus bkrus te /
T02D2923:322a-39: sngags kyis mngon par bsngags ba'i sa rdza na'i bdug
T02D2923:322a-40: pa byin na gdon gyis bzung ba las thar bar
T02D2923:322a-41: 'gyur ro // 'byung po dgug par 'dod na smad
T02D2923:322b-0: 'tshong @322b gi ras la rgya skyegs kyi khu bas
T02D2923:322b-1: sngar bstan pa'i 'khor lo'i lte bar nu t'a a'a
T02D2923:322b-2: k'arsha ya dza:zhes pa'i spel tshig dang bcas pa bris
T02D2923:322b-3: nas grog mkhar la sogs pa'i sa las byas pa'i
T02D2923:322b-4: gzugs brnyan gyi snying gar bcug ste /
T02D2923:322b-5: mandal gyi steng du bram ze'i thod par gzhag la /
T02D2923:322b-6: rang lha'i rnal 'byor du gnas pa'i mdun du lhag pa'i lha gsal bar dmigs te /
T02D2923:322b-7: de las spros pa'i pho nyas bkug cing gzhug pa'ang byas te /
T02D2923:322b-8: sngags kyi mthar 'byung po a'a k'arsha ya dza: zhes pa bzlas shing /
T02D2923:322b-9: 'bras chan dang 'bru'i thug pa dang la phug la
T02D2923:322b-10: sogs pa 'byung po'i gtor ma'i nye bar sbyor ba
T02D2923:322b-11: byas na 'byung po zhugs nas bdag gis las ci
T02D2923:322b-14: de nas rig sngags kyi las thams cad byed du 'jug par mngag pa ni /
T02D2923:322b-15: sngar bstan pa'i gtor ma dus gsum du sbyin zhing /
T02D2923:322b-16: bh'u ta wa sham m'a na ye zhes pa'i spel tshig dang bcas pa'i sngags bzlas te /
T02D2923:322b-17: bram ze mo gcang ma'i zla mtshan gyis bsgos pa'i ras dang sa rdza na'i bdug pa byin nas /
T02D2923:322b-18: mngon par bsngags pa'i tsandan dmar po'i thig le dpral
T02D2923:322b-19: bar byas na ci bsgo ba nyan cing mngag gzhug
T02D2923:322b-21: de ltar dbang du gyur pa de rig sngags kyi
T02D2923:322b-22: las gang bsngags kyang myur du grub pa'i grogs byed
T02D2923:322b-23: do // gal te las ma grub na spogs pa'i
T02D2923:322b-24: cho gas grub par byed pa ni rang gi mdun
T02D2923:322b-26: der 'dod pa'i lha'i sku gzugs bzhugs la /
T02D2923:322b-27: rang lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas lhag pa'i lha mdun du gsal bar dmigs nas /
T02D2923:322b-28: de las sngags brjod pa dang bcas pa'i me tog khri phrag gcig phul la /
T02D2923:322b-29: de nas me tog de rnams bsdus te /
T02D2923:322b-30: de nyid kyis bsreg rdzas byas pa'i sbyin sreg de
T02D2923:322b-31: nyid du byas na las ma grub pa rnams grub
T02D2923:322b-33: grub pa chud mi za bar bya ba'i phyir las kyi 'bras bu dbyung ba ni /
T02D2923:322b-34: las dang mthun pa'i thab khung du bud shing brtsigs
T02D2923:322b-35: nas me sbar ba'i dbus su lhag pa'i lha gsal
T02D2923:322b-36: bar dmigs la / de nas las gang sgrub kyi
T02D2923:322b-37: spel tshig dang bcas pa'i sngags kyis de dang mthun
T02D2923:322b-38: pa'i sbyin sreg byas na bsgrubs pa'i las rnams chud
T02D2923:323a-0: mi za bar gang mngon par 'dod pa'i @323a *
T02D2923:323a-1: bar dmigs la / // 'bras bu des 'byin par byed do //
T02D2923:323a-2: mngon par 'dod pa'i 'bras bu sgrub par 'dod na
T02D2923:323a-3: gnas dben par mandal gyi steng du lhag pa'i lha'i
T02D2923:323a-5: de'i drung du rin po che'i snod du dngos grub
T02D2923:323a-6: kyi rdzas bzhag nas rang lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan
T02D2923:323a-7: pas / mdun du lhag pa'i lha gsal bar dmigs te /
T02D2923:323a-8: de la mchod pa dang bstod pa sngon du song bas sngags kyi bzlas pa bya zhing /
T02D2923:323a-9: pho nya'i tshogs spro ba dang bsdu ba'i sbyor bas dngos grub sgrub par dmigs te /
T02D2923:323a-10: dro ba dang du ba 'thul ba dang 'bar ba
T02D2923:323a-11: las mkha' spyod dang sa spyod dang sa 'og gi
T02D2923:323a-12: dngos grub sbyin par byed do //
T02D2923:323a-13: sems can thams cad bsrung bar 'dod na tshes grangs
T02D2923:323a-14: dang dus tshod bzang po la sgrub pa po shar
T02D2923:323a-15: du mngon par phyogs pas gro ga'am ras la gur
T02D2923:323a-16: gum mam gi wang gis sngar bstan pa'i 'khor lo'i
T02D2923:323a-17: lte bar ming spel tshig dang bcas pa bris la
T02D2923:323a-18: / rang lha'i rnal 'byor du gnas ba'i mdun du
T02D2923:323a-19: lhag pa'i lha spyan drangs nas mchod bstod byas te
T02D2923:323a-20: / / 'khor lo'i sngags dang dbyer med du bstims
T02D2923:323a-21: nas bzlas pa ci rigs byas na mgo'am mgul pa'am
T02D2923:323a-22: dpung ba la btags na gang la btags pa'i sems
T02D2923:323a-23: can thams cad nad dang gdon la sogs pa'i mi
T02D2923:323a-24: mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad srung bar byed do //
T02D2923:323a-25: gal te rang bzhin gyi nad dang gdon la sogs ba zhi bar 'dod na /
T02D2923:323a-26: dge ba'i shing gi lo ma la tsandan dkar po'i
T02D2923:323a-27: khu bas sngar bstan pa'i 'khor lo'i lte bar zhi
T02D2923:323a-28: ba'i spel tshig dang bcas pa bris la /
T02D2923:323a-29: rang lha'i rnal 'byor dang mdun du lhag pa'i lha
T02D2923:323a-30: dmigs nas de'i lus kyi 'od zer gyis 'khor lo
T02D2923:323a-31: dang / 'khor lo las 'phros pa'i 'od zer gyis
T02D2923:323a-32: bsgrub bya'i lus kun nas 'gengs par bsgoms zhing sngags
T02D2923:323a-33: bzlas pa'i mthar 'khor lo 'o mas bkrus nas /
T02D2923:323a-34: des gang la khrus byas pa de'i nad gdon zhi bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2923:323a-35: yang tshe dang longs spyod la sogs pa rgyas par
T02D2923:323a-36: 'dod na rang lha'i rnal 'byor byas pa'i mdun du
T02D2923:323a-37: lhag pa'i lha gsal bar bltas la /
T02D2923:323a-38: pushtim ku ru aom zhes pa'i spel tshig dang bcas
T02D2923:323a-39: pa'i sngags bzlas shing mdun gyi lha las gser btso
T02D2923:323a-40: ma lta bu'i 'od zer gyi phreng ba spros pas
T02D2923:323b-0: gang la dmigs nas las sgrub @323b pa de'i lus
T02D2923:323b-1: kun du khyab cing yongs su rgyas par bsgoms pas
T02D2923:323b-2: tshe dang longs spyod la sogs pa rgyas par byed
T02D2923:323b-3: do // gal te rengs pa'i las sgrub par 'dod
T02D2923:323b-4: na dur khrod kyi ras la yung ba'i khu bas
T02D2923:323b-5: sngar bstan pa'i 'khor lo che ge mo'i k'a ya
T02D2923:323b-6: w'aka tsitta stam bha ya lam zhes pa'i spel tshig
T02D2923:323b-8: grog mkhar la sogs pa'i sa las byas pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi snying gar bcug ste /
T02D2923:323b-9: rang lha'i rnal 'byor la gnas pa'i mdun du lhag pa'i lha dmigs nas /
T02D2923:323b-10: de la rnam par spros pa'i pho nya'i tshogs kyis bsgrub bya bkug cing bstims la /
T02D2923:323b-11: de nas sngags bzlas pa dang /
T02D2923:323b-12: rig pa'i mthu las byung ba'i dbang chen dang /
T02D2923:323b-13: ri bo la gnas pa'i rdo rje'i tshogs kyis lus
T02D2923:323b-14: dang yan lag thams cad rnam par gtams shing mi
T02D2923:323b-15: g-yo bar bsams na rengs pa la the tshom med
T02D2923:323b-16: do // gzhan yang rmugs par bya bar 'dod na /
T02D2923:323b-17: dur khrod kyi ras la myos byed kyi khu ba
T02D2923:323b-18: dang nim pa'i 'dab mas sngar bstan pa'i 'khor lo'i
T02D2923:323b-19: lte bar che ge mo mo ha ya zhes pa'i
T02D2923:323b-20: spel tshig dang bcas pa bris nas /
T02D2923:323b-21: grog mkhar gyi sa las byas pa'i gzugs kyi snying gar bcug ste /
T02D2923:323b-22: rang lha'i rnal 'byor dang mdun du lhag pa'i lha dmigs la /
T02D2923:323b-23: de las spros pa'i pho nyas bsgrub bya bkug cing bstims te /
T02D2923:323b-24: de nas gsang sngags bzlas pa'i rig pa'i mthu las
T02D2923:323b-25: byung ba'i dbang chen dang ri bo la gnas pa'i
T02D2923:323b-26: rdo rje snying gar mnan te /
T02D2923:323b-27: dran pa dang bral bar bsams na rmugs par byed pa la the tshom med do //
T02D2923:323b-28: gang la bsnyen pa byas pa'i sngags //
T02D2923:323b-29: las sgrub pa'ang de nyid de //
T02D2923:323b-30: dang brtan the tshom med pa la //
T02D2923:323b-31: sngags ni yid bzhin nor ltar 'grub //
T02D2923:323b-32: rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i las sgrub pa'i thabs
T02D2923:323b-33: kyi cho ga byang chub sems dpa' byams pa'i zhabs
T02D2923:323b-35: dpal gam g'a dha ra'i sras kyi thu bo bram ze ma ni badzras mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D2923:323b-37: // / pandi ta dzny'a na shr'i dang /
